subject: Religion & Spirituality
subcategory: Sacred Texts That Shaped the World
title: The Future of Sacred Texts
description: Learn The Future of Sacred Texts in one minute.

hook.text: Will anyone write a new sacred text? Or is the age of scripture over? The answer may surprise you.

buildup.text: New religious movements keep producing texts. Scientology, Mormonism, and Baha'i all have modern scriptures.

discovery.text: AI can now generate text that sounds spiritual. If a machine writes something profound, can it be sacred?

twist.text: Sacredness isn't in the words. It's in the community that reveres them. Any text can become scripture if people believe.

climax.text: The age of sacred texts isn't over. Humans will always need stories bigger than themselves. Only the format changes.

punchline.text: Humans always need sacred stories. The format changes. The need never will.

quiz.question: Is the era of creating sacred texts over?
options: Yes, no more will ever be written
No, new religious movements continue to produce scripture
